quotes.quote: I know how men in exile feed on dreams of hope.
quotes.author: Aeschylus

quotes.quote: He who despairs over an event is a coward, but he who holds hope for the human condition is a fool.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Until the day when God shall deign to reveal the future to man, all human wisdom is summed up in these two words,--'Wait and hope'.
quotes.author: Alexandre Dumas

quotes.quote: Hope doesn't come from calculating whether the good news is winning out over the bad. It's simply a choice to take action.
quotes.author: Anna Lappe

quotes.quote: Hope begins in the dark, the stubborn hope that if you just show up and try to do the right thing, the dawn will come. You wait and watch and work: You don't give up.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: Hope is a waking dream.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: We have been told we cannot do this by a chorus of cynics. They will only grow louder and more dissonant in the weeks to come. We've been asked to pause for a reality check; we've been warned against offering the people of this nation false hope. But in the unlikely story that is America, there has never been anything false about hope.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: He that lives upon hope will die fasting.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: While there's life, there's hope.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote:
Hope is the thing with feathers
That perches in the soul.
And sings the tune
Without the words,
and never stops at all.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: Do not spoil what you have by desiring what you have not; but remember that what you now have was once among the things you only hoped for.
quotes.author: Epicurus

quotes.quote: He who has never hoped can never despair.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: History is moving, and it will tend toward hope, or tend toward tragedy.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: Never deprive someone of hope; it might be all they have.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quotes.quote: Hope is only the love of life.
quotes.author: Henri-Fr�d�ric Amiel

quotes.quote: Young people have an almost biological destiny to be hopeful.
quotes.author: Marshall Ganz

quotes.quote:
Hope, like the gleaming taper's light,
Adorns and cheers our way;
And still, as darker grows the night,
Emits a brighter ray.
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.quote: Take hope from the heart of man, and you make him a beast of prey.
quotes.author: Quida

quotes.quote: It is difficult to say what is impossible, for the dream of yesterday is the hope of today and the reality of tomorrow.
quotes.author: Robert H. Goddard

quotes.quote: To travel hopefully is a better thing than to arrive.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Hope is necessary in every condition.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: The past is a source of knowledge, and the future is a source of hope. Love of the past implies faith in the future.
quotes.author: Stephen Ambrose

quotes.quote:
Cease, every joy, to glimmer on my mind,
But leave---oh! leave the light of Hope behind.
quotes.author: Thomas Campbell

quotes.quote: Appetite, with an opinion of attaining, is called hope; the same, without such opinion, despair.
quotes.author: Thomas Hobbes

quotes.quote: Never lose hope.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote:
True hope is swift, and flies with swallow's wings;
Kings it makes gods, and meaner creatures kings.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote:
I can endure my own despair,
but not another's hope.
quotes.author: William Walsh
